chunk:
Grown Alchemist Brightening Serum (2019 formulation)

Brand: Grown Alchemist

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua (Purified Water), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Glycerin (Plant), Rumex Occidentalis (Rumex) Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate (Plant), Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi (Bearberry) Leaf Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Aminomethyl

(Plant), Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi (Bearberry) Leaf Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose (Plant).

Directions: Apply both morning and evening after cleansing and before moisturisers and Facial Oils. Apply 2-3 pumps to finger tips and smooth into facial skin, neck and décolletage with gentle stroking movements focusing on areas of discoloration. Can be applied over the orbital bone, and around the eye contour area. Suitable for all skin types.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer
